Flow.description: DEPRECATED 2024-09-23- CS - Added flow logging 2024-09-11: There are going to be TWO versions of this flow that it would be a good idea to keep up-to-date: v1 and this version. The difference is that v1 collects ALL documents from Docrio and sends them to Tekmir. In v2, however, we are only looking for the Retainer to send. As of right now, v2 is the preferred one but v1 may become applicable later.

formulas.name: executorYesNo
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Confirm_if_caller_is_next_of_kin__c},"The caller is the formal next of kin (when through all levels and they are the next in line)"),"Yes","No")
